::: {.bio-section}
I am a Research Associate at the [Luxembourg Institute of Socio-Economic Research](https://www.liser.lu/){target="_blank"} (LISER), working at the [Labour Market Department](https://www.liser.lu/labour-market){target="_blank"}.

I have recently obtained a PhD in Economics from the University of Luxembourg as part of the [Doctoral Team Unit ACROSS](https://sites.google.com/view/fredericdocquier/xingb-blog/across){target="_blank"} at LISER and was a visiting scholar at [ETH Zürich (Public Policy Group)](https://pp.ethz.ch/){target="_blank"}. I co-organize the [DSS Seminar Series](https://www.liser.lu/data-science-and-simulation){target="_blank"}.
:::
